Class TestResourceFinderModule

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.xacml.finder.ResourceFinderModule
      com.sun.xacml.test.TestResourceFinderModule

public class TestResourceFinderModule
extends ResourceFinderModule

A ResourceFinderModule used to handle the hierarchical resources in the conformance tests.

Author:
Seth Proctor
